attributes.action: Ask the 'Hottest Band In the World' KISS to perform live in the UK in 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been over 10 years since KISS toured the UK. We ask that Gene Simmons and Paul Stanley are contacted by UK government agencies and asked to consider the UK/USA 'special relationship'and tour the UK in 2007.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
